div.p: A set of codes that describe the level of authorization given to a provider to practice medicine at an institution.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/practitioner-hspc-privilege defines the following codes:

tr.td: The provider is allowed to practice and admit
No Privileges to practice or admit
The provider is not allowed to practice or admit
The provider is not allowed to practice or admit at this time
Practice Privileges Only (not allowed to admit)
The provider is allowed to practice only, cannot admit patients
The provider is allowed to practice and admit for a limited time
